valence_explanation: Does the music lean toward the happy side, or the sad side? Higher numbers tend to be happier, lower numbers tend to be sadder.
instrumentalness_explanation: Is the music more about the instruments or the vocals? Higher numbers mean more emphasis on instruments, lower numbers mean more emphasis on vocals.
popularity_explanation: How many Spotify users also listen to this music? Higher numbers mean more listeners.
energy_explanation: Is the music fast-paced and intense, or relaxed and chill? High numbers mean more intensity.
range_explanation: How diverse is the user's music taste? Higher numbers mean more diversity.
